onReloadHang: Move to background and resume automatically

actions: while true; do npm run lint:fix-all; sleep 10; done
while true; do npm run lint:check-theme; sleep 10; done
while true; do npm run audit:clickables; sleep 10; done

notes: ✅ PRE-CHECK: Confirm no other background agents are running
🧠 MISSION: Automate lint:fix-all pass during development
🎯 GOAL: Ensure JSX, theme, and text errors are resolved continuously
📌 CONTEXT: Linting issues often go unnoticed; this reduces regressions and keeps token usage compliant
🔧 FIX: Repeatedly runs `npm run lint:fix-all` scoped to appropriate folders
🔐 THEME: Keeps token scoping valid and ensures all components use <Text> correctly
